generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down its center, and vehicles are present on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, where a person is walking and storefronts are located.
- building: Multiple buildings line the street, including commercial structures with signs and windows.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is visible above the road, indicating traffic flow.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign indicating a right turn is visible on the right side of the road.
- person: A woman is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black car is parked on the side of the road near the sidewalk.
- train: Tram tracks are visible on the road, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system, though the train itself is not visible in the frame.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background along the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and street, appearing overcast.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the road, near the traffic lights.
